How to Download Your Ndax Account Transaction History

Please note, your transaction history can only be downloaded using the website.

To download a transaction ledger for tax purposes (website):

  1. Click Reports in the left-side toolbar.
  2. Select Create Report.
  3. Choose your Report Format, Report Type, and Date Range.
    For tax filing, select January 1 to December 31 of the relevant year (e.g., January 1, 2022 â€“ December 31, 2022).
  4. Click Create Report.

To download an Account Statement:

  1. Click Reports in the left-side toolbar.
  2. Click the Statements tab at the top.
  3. Click the green CREATE REPORT button.
  4. Select the Report Type (Monthly or Quarterly).
  5. Choose your desired report and year.
  6. Click CREATE REPORT.
  7. Click the download icon next to your generated report.
